VFECore.Misc.HireableFactionDef.label: Colonial Mercenaries
VFECore.Misc.HireableFactionDef.description: A group of organized mercenaries comprised of mostly non-commissioned officers and amateur militiamen. They'll take on any job from cargo escort to clearing insect hives, and if you can afford it they won't mind taking down a fortress with some heavy firepower.
